# etcd_key (Resource)

Key value for etcd.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "etcd_key" "hello_world" {
    key = "/hello"
    value = "world"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **key** (String) Key to set.
- **value** (String) Value to store in the key.

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
